text:
Tonight we went to grandma's {place} to celebrate Christmas! She lives {number} minutes away. We packed up the car with wrapped gifts, {flavor} chips with chip dip, and us! But first, we had to bundle up with {article of clothing}, scarves, and {type of shoe}s. It sure was {temperature} outside. You should see all of the snow!

Everyone is going to be at Grandma's house today. Little cousin Marni and my older cousin Danny will be here, and at least {number} other cousins and {number} aunts or uncles. My aunt {name} will be in charge of handing out all of the {plural noun}, while Grandpa carves the Christmas {food}.

On the way here, we saw {number} turkeys! I bet they're happy not to be dinner tonight. We saw house after house with {color} and {color} Christmas lights, snowmen with round {plural body part}, and even a few decorative {plural animal} with Santa hats. We sang along to songs on the radio. My favorite one is 'A Holly Jolly {holiday}.'

Time to open presents! I really hope I get a new {noun}. I definitely don't want any more {plural noun}.
